Nightshift listens thoughtfully to Lord Elders exlanation and then remember=
s something he was told by Yoketron about how important balance was.

" I c=
an see why you're concerned.  Balance is everything, it's the blood and hea=
rt of every planet, according ta Master Yoketron.  Upset that and chaos ens=
ues.  We gotta stop the chaos before it takes this planet.  I think that's =
why that old dragon approached Tucson..  With his temper'n strength, he can=
 sure make a difference as ta how well this planet is protected.  The drago=
n is wise, strong, and steadfast.   He protects life as if it were his own.=
  That's it..  The dragons cave, I bet we can get a lotta answers if we vis=
it the cave."

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for thi=
ngs you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On=

to chronicle the unfolding

To observe how the

 free on Earth and it changed our entire

're concerned.  Balance is everything, it's the blood and heart of eve=
ry planet, according ta Master Yoketron.  Upset that and chaos ensues.=
  We gotta stop the chaos before it takes this planet.  I think t=
hat's why that old dragon approached Tucson..  With his temper'n stren=
gth, he can sure make a difference as ta how well this planet is protected.=
  The dragon is wise, strong, and steadfast.   He protects life a=
s if it were his own.  That's it..  The dragons cave, I bet we ca=
n get a lotta answers if we visit the cave."</div><div><br>Don't be envious=

othing is worth more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Nov 8, 2011,=

> Nightshift turns to Lord Elder with a cocked head.<br>

" Watchers?  I gotta be honest with ya Sir, I really don't know who they<br=
>
> are.  I've never seen them or met them.  But if I did I'd sure watch=
 my step<br>
> around them.  Do they have someth'n ta do with the counci=
l?"<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
LORD ELDER sighed as he glanced at POLAR =
CLAW and then back at NIGHTSHIFT.<br>
<br>
Folding his arms behind his back=
 ELDER looked troubled, his optics<br>
dimmed thoughtfully. Finally he rais=
ed his optics to once again look<br>
at NIGHTSHIFT, and he began to speak.<=
br>
<br>
"When the Maximals once against started coming back to Earth after=
 the<br>
first Beast Wars, the watchers . . . " There was a pause before he=
<br>
continued, " . .  I mean WE watchers we sent back by the council to<br=
>
keep an optic on things. At first we were to chronicle the unfolding<br>
=
events here on Earth, but never to interfere. To observe how the<br>
humans=
 and other life forms progressed and catalog all we found and<br>
send word=
 back to Cybertron."<br>
<br>
LORD ELDER shook his head, "But then the Meph=
ilis crash landed setting<br>
untold number of criminals free on Earth and =
it changed our entire<br>
mission."<br>
